meaning_str.bing:
adv. 正确地；适当地；恰当地；得体地
网络. 彻底地；正常地；正当地

正确地；适当地；恰当地；得体地

正确地；适当地；得体地；恰当地；实际上；严格地说；彻底地；完全地；符合习俗地

1.en: In a real application, with a properly configured Web server, extract this CSS and put it in a static file served by the Web server.
1.cn: 在实际的应用程序中，需要有一个正确配置的Web服务器，将这个CSS提取出来，并将其放到Web服务器所服务的静态文件中。

2.en: The unseemly appearance of this dirty garment was heightened by the circumstance that he had not taken the trouble to adjust it properly.
2.cn: 这件脏罩衣本来就不很雅观，加上他平时懒得整理，看上去简直不成样子。

3.en: It is difficult for me to properly explain my selection on such a basis, but I'll think on it some more.
3.cn: 我很难在这样的基础上正确解释我的选择，我会再想想的。

0.en: Perhaps the three of us can sit down tomorrow and talk properly.
0.cn: 也许明天我们三个可以坐下来好好谈谈。

1.en: It should be with us. We have to look after it properly. We liberated it.
1.cn: 它应该属于我们 我们可以打理好它，我们解放了它。

2.en: I'll do it properly when I get back and tear this up before you ever see it.
2.cn: 回来之后，我会着手操办并把这封信撕了，不让你看见。

3.en: That's right. We are big girls. And George and Richard are too little to play together properly.
3.cn: 说得没错。我们要做榜样。可是乔治和理查德太小啦，没有办法在一起玩。

4.en: Daddy, can we help put up the picture? You can watch and then you'll learn how to do it properly.
4.cn: 爸爸，我们可以帮你挂照片吗？你们就看着然后你们就知道怎么做了。

5.en: Daddy, can we help put up the picture? You can watch and then you'll learn how to do it properly.
5.cn: 爸爸，我们可以帮你挂照片吗？你们就看着然后你们就知道怎么做了。

6.en: Well, he did not get sick somewhere in there and it was immediately found and properly cleaned up.
6.cn: 它没有到处呕吐，而且立刻被发现，并妥当处理干净了。

7.en: Okay. This is properly none of my business, but how long do you think you‘re gonna keep seeing her?
7.cn: 好吧，这可能不关我的事，只是你认为你还会跟她好多久？

8.en: You're really very good at it! Am I? Oh, I can do it! Look at me! Look at me! I can ride my bike properly.
8.cn: 你真的骑得很好哦，佩琪。是吗？我真的做到了 看我！快看我！我真的会骑两轮自行车了。

9.en: You need to increase your spider intake, so he'll be able to climb ceilings properly. And eat lots of sheep bile.
9.cn: 你需要增加蜘蛛的摄入量，那么他就可以有能力爬上天花板了，还有多吃羊胆汁。

10.en: That won't be necessary. We'll turn over everything immediately. Once we're properly compensated for our time and effort.
10.cn: 那不必了，我们会立即移交所有文件，条件是必须补偿我们付出的时间和辛劳。

11.en: What's all this crying about? George and Richard always cry when they play together. They are just too little to play properly.
11.cn: 你们两个人为什么哭了呢？乔治和理查德只要在一起玩，他们就总是会哭。他们两个太小啦，没有办法在一起玩。

12.en: But it's when you don't wash properly, or even worse, only wash with water, that how you dry your hands can make all the difference.
12.cn: 但是如果你不正确洗手，更糟的是，只用清水洗手，如何擦干手就会影响很大了。

13.en: Yes, but with a very long gap in the middle. We only met properly a few days ago and now you want to spend the rest of your life with me?
13.cn: 没错，可中间断了很长时间的联系，直到几天前我们才再次相遇，而你这就说想跟我共度余生了。

14.en: Would George be taken to hospital and given medicine? No, George just has to go to bed. Oh, so George is not really properly ill. That's disgusting.
14.cn: 乔治是不是会被送到医院里去，还要吃药治疗？不用，乔治只要上床休息就好了。所以乔治并不是真的生病了对不对？你这样实在是太恶心了！

15.en: You'll attack me the moment I let you go. No I won't. You would think an evil super-villain would learn how to properly lie. I bet it's the one-inch man.
15.cn: 一旦放了你，你就会袭击我。不，我不会。你应该知道一个穷凶极恶的恶棍通常都会学习如何撒谎。我敢打赌一定是那个一英寸高的人。

16.en: Well, you'll be happy to know that if you wash your hands properly with soap, nearly all traces of bacteria will be removed, regardless of how you dry them.
16.cn: 其实无论你怎么擦干手，只要用肥皂洗手，几乎细菌就会一干二净。

17.en: Mr. Chairman, we need all these case files so that we can properly represent the client's interests, and Mr. Gardner and Ms. Lockhart are actively delaying...
17.cn: 主席先生，我们需要所有的案件卷宗，这样我们才能完全代表委托人的利益，加德纳先生和洛克哈特女士在故意拖延...

18.en: Here it is. The Polyjuice Potion. Properly brewed, the Polyjuice Potion allows the drinker to transform himself temporarily into the physical form of another.
18.cn: 找到了。所谓的变身水，只要作出正确的调配，这种魔药就可以让喝下的人暂时的完全变成另外一个人的样子。

19.en: And because our need to be right can be more important than our need to find out what's true, we like to believe our own opinions without properly stress-testing them.
19.cn: 因为自我正确的需要可能比真相更重要，对我们自己的观点，我们喜欢不加审视地相信。
